titles.title: To make a technical correction relating to the land conveyance authorized by Public Law 108-67.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 12/7/2005--Introduced. Makes a technical correction relating to the description of the conveyance authorized by P.L. 108-67 (a law providing for the conveyance of certain land to the Washoe Indian Tribe of Nevada and California).
